The Numismatist's Backpack can hold all kinds of currency.
Backpacks store a large variety of items that match their type. The Adventurer's Backpack will store most dungeon loot, for example.
Logistics Pipes is a powerful item sorting mod, and Practical Logistics is a more in-depth version of it.
Logistics Pipes works well with ME Systems. Simply have items set an Interface as the default route to preserve your other destinations. You can even place a Provider Pipe (or Module) on one.
